snippet.title: Innchanted - Steam Teaser July 2020
snippet.description:
We have changed our name from Chaos Tavern to something with more puns in it - Introducing Innchanted!

Innchanted is a co-op adventure where you discover magical potions, serve otherworldly guests, and pacify monsters. Gather your party and journey on a quest to overcome the evil Wizard – your landlord!

Keep in touch with the development and upcoming closed beta's at www.innchanted.com
Or wishlist our game at https://store.steampowered.com/app/1369720/Innchanted/
